main event: Numerous unidentified lights were sighted in the vicinity of Camp Hood, Texas between March 15-19, 1949.
interesting points: Four unidentified lights, including yellow and red ones, were noticed in the area, as reported by multiple patrols and enlisted men.
Blinking lights and yellow ones were observed at different times and locations by military personnel and patrols, with no apparent cause or explanation found upon investigation.
The sightings occurred at different altitudes and distances from the observers, with no sound or odor reported.
Despite multiple sightings and extensive investigation, no concrete explanation or identification of the objects was achieved.
The report was forwarded to the Commanding General of the Air Materiel Command at Wright Patterson Air Force Base for further action.
